S

sendData(String) - Method in class gameController
This method sends a message to the arduino so that it performs a certain action
setBoard() - Static method in class mainGame
Sets the initial board of the game, by setting every tile to 0, to indicate that it doesn't contain a mine.
setData(Object) - Method in class Node
sets the data of a specific node to the new data
setMines() - Static method in class mainGame
Randomly select 12 tiles and changes their value to 1, to indicate that it contains a mine.
setNext(Node) - Method in class Node
sets the next node to the specified node
setRevealed(int, int) - Static method in class mainGame
Sets a given tile the revealed status
showTile(Button, int, int) - Method in class gameController
This method shows every tile if the selected tile has a bomb, if not, it shows the number of adjacent mines for the selected tile.

Starts the game by loading the main menu FXML file
startTime() - Method in class gameController
Starts a time counter for the game.
